i just did this today. You go into the Dr drink this drink they have orange or strawberry. Tastes pretty good lol. You sit there for an hour. Then they will come get you poke your finger and draw your blood to make sure your iron is good and also to make sure you don't have gestasiinal diabetes.

I'll be 27week when I get mine done and ya they gave me the drink at my last apt on Friday and said to put it in my fridge I got the orange drink cause it was the only one they had I hope its good lol but thanks ladies
oh weird. They give u it to bring home. Mine u drink in the dr office.

They gave me mine to take home too haha they say its so you don't have to wait around there for an hour you can just drink it an hour before your appointment and come in and immediately have your blood drawn.
